column2: You know who's an amazing jazz pianist? Hazel Scott. She's pretty good.
You know who's an amazing drummer? Neil Pert. He's pretty good.
You know who's an amazing lyricist? Chico Buarque. He's pretty good.
[wave,3]You know who's an amazing guitar player?[!wave] Mike Oldfield. He's pretty good.
<size=50%>Your eyes had rolled back into your head and you were chittering about musicians.</size>
Let's [wave]get something to eat[!wave]. I'm starving right now.
<size=50%>Chittering? That sounds like someone else...</size> I could go for some <size=110%>Submarine Sandwiches</size> right now.
<size=50%>Maybe you are okay</size> Let's go eat!
Tell me about your time at <color=yellow>University of American Samoa</color>.
Are you asking about anything in particular?
You're you're you're you're you're you're
You're. You're. You're. You're. You're. You're. You're. You're. You're.
